custom_configuration_fields.tooltip_text: Account ID in Brightcove Videocloud. For more information, see: https://support.brightcove.com/managing-account-settings#account
client ID that is used in getting access_token for the Brightcove API. For more information, see: https://support.brightcove.com/managing-api-authentication-credentials#Creating_client_registrations

client secret that is used in getting access_token for the Brightcove API. For more information, see: https://support.brightcove.com/managing-api-authentication-credentials#Creating_client_registrations
